channel.title: Stop interface flashing
channel.description: When ever I try to add a new interface menu, it flashes on the screen, I know its from being called from the public boolean process, is there anyway to work around this problem that maybe someone could help me out on? Just been a while since I've had a problem like this and don't want to make extra timers if i don't have too.

item.title: Stop interface flashing
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

jungledude:

You need to take out any other show interfaces to make it stop flashing.

And that was the problem I was having, I still had old previous frames on the screen which i wasn’t using, so removing those corrected this problem i was having, Thanks -Legend- for the original idea, and Thanks jungle for opening my eyes. after i read your post, everything started coming back to me and i was like “DUH” So much <3 to you guys.

Read full topic

@Legend1 wrote:

Wow, I feel brain blocked…wtf. I took out where it says “wildy” on the bottom, then it gives the error for the method, so take out the write wildy method =D.

Maybe cause its in boolean process so its reloading every 500ms or so?

item.title: Stop interface flashing
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

-Legend-:

I got it too stop flashing because I took out the bottom right corner the Wildy sign.

Wouldn’t that be the write wildy level void that shows that interface? or should i be looking for something else? Thanks for some idea’s so far

Read full topic

item.title: Stop interface flashing
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

-Legend-:

The top right interface menu?

Ya, Its the menu on the screen, not the regular sendframe where it just shows the text, its the block it throws up in the top right corner, all my other interface screens seem to work accordingly, but when i add this one, it flickers on and off.

this is the interface im trying to use.

if((absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3267 && absY >= 2752 && absY <= 2808)) { sendQuest("@red@", 15894); sendQuest("@whi@Vermin Murders", 15895); sendQuest("", 15896); sendQuest("@whi@Imps Left:@gre@ " +imppoints, 15897); sendQuest("@whi@Goblins Left:@gre@ " +goblinpoints, 15898); sendQuest("@whi@", 15899); sendQuest("@whi@", 15900); sendQuest("@whi@", 15901); sendQuest("", 15902); sendQuest("", 15903); sendQuest("", 15904); sendQuest("", 15905); sendQuest("", 15906); setInterfaceWalkable(15892); }

Mainly using it for part of my quest I’m making, I’ve also had a few beers to drink so my thinking ability it a little short term right now. Any suggestion would be great.

Read full topic
